repository_metadata.notes: The photo archive is a collection of photographs and materials illustrating important educational processes, significant scientific achievements, development of information and communication technologies, evolution of BSU structural units and departments, international cooperation, patriotic actions, teaching innovations and student success in learning, research and intellectual competitions, extra-curricular activities, initiatives of BSU activists and students self-governing bodies, BSU hostels, participation in sports and cultural events.
